page.title: 04 The Rules of Skipping
page.content: First you get a long piece of rope then go to an open space out side.You need three or more people to play, you need two people holding the ends of the rope.Then they turn the rope around and around then some one stands in the middle and when the rope comes down you jump over it. You can sing tunes to the speed of the rope and you can go fast or slow you can have competition to see who can go the fastest and who can go the slowest and you can see who can do the most.These are some games i know how to play. You skip once and then you run out then you count four then run in do one skip then run out again and you keep doing this for as long as you want. Another game you can play is where you see how many people can be jumping at the same time in the rope.We've done 39 jumps altogether.
